{"id":995637931,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1689487487,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/995637931/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Maximum Number of String Pairs","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValidPair(string& a, string& b){\n        if(a.length()!=b.length()) return false;\n        int n=a.length();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) if(a[i]!=b[n-i-1]) return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n    int maximumNumberOfStringPairs(vector<string>& words) {\n        int n=words.size(),stringPairs=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)\n        for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)\n        if(isValidPair(words[i],words[j])) stringPairs++;\n        return stringPairs;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-maximum-number-of-string-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
